attributes.action: oblige ministers and senior civil servants at the Ministry of Defence and Treasury each to spend at least two weeks serving with the Army in Iraq or Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of the armed forces literally risk their lives in the service of the Crown.  It would help those who control the Treasury and MoD in their decision-making if they were to see the effect of their policy decisions on the front line.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
